title: retro font
content:
hi! some ideas for this?  
thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Deep_5195.jpg)
author: rockberto

comments.content:
It looks like **[Legrand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160304/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=FontShop&ffam=Legrand%20-%20Regular&fid=22a0c7a0e787bf026ebeb66b94e0d626&fsize=60&text=History%2C%20Hits&fit=1)** by Richard William Mueller (1993), which seems to be published by FontShop (1999) but I can't find any legitimate sources for it.

**Edit:** The original typeface name is Roberta, designed by Bob Trogman in 1962 as identified by HVB in this thread:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/96218](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160304/http:/typophile.com/node/96218 "http://typophile.com/node/96218")

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160304/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
